definition: to pay no attention to/to disregard/to ignore/to let go unpunished/to let off
(negative prefix)/not/no
to ask
not to hear, not to question (idiom)/to show no interest in sth/uncritical/not in the least concerned
not distinguishing red-green or black-white (idiom)/not to distinguish between right and wrong
pinyin: bu4 wen4 qing1 hong2 zao4 bai2

definition: to pass by without showing interest (idiom)
no matter what may happen (idiom)
Don't ask and you won't be told any lies. (idiom)
pinyin: bu4 wen4 jiu4 ting1 bu4 dao4 jia3 hua4

sentences.english: Obedience is the aim of supporting parents. No why and no reason to speak of.
sentences.chinese: 养亲旨在顺意，不问为什么，也不能讲什么大道理。

sentences.english: Do you live in luxury without caring for the needy?
sentences.chinese: 你是否生活奢侈，却对有需要的人不闻不问？

sentences.english: Particularly he play with arts, and don't pursuit fame and secular.
sentences.chinese: 特别是他“玩儿”艺术，不求功名，不问市侩。

sentences.english: Do not ask next two ears, one in the head-on embroidery.
sentences.chinese: 两耳不问身旁事，一心扑在绣品上。

sentences.english: My parents asked all did not ask on disassembles the letter looked.
sentences.chinese: 我父母问都不问就把信拆开来看。

sentences.english: Do not ask why, just take it as given that there is unemployment.
sentences.chinese: 不问所以然，只是把失业的存在作为前定条件。

sentences.english: He shut his ears to all appeals for help.
sentences.chinese: 他对于一切求助的呼声都不闻不问。

sentences.english: I wonder when you would have spoken, if I had not asked you!
sentences.chinese: 要是我不问你一声，不知你什么时候才肯说出来。

sentences.english: I can't ignore your rudeness any longer.
sentences.chinese: 对于你的粗暴无礼，我再也不能不闻不问了。

sentences.english: I would prefer a situation in which we had a genuinely apolitical military.
sentences.chinese: 我更喜欢的是一个真正不问政事的军队。

sentences.english: To disregard intentionally or allow to pass unnoticed or unmentioned.
sentences.chinese: 忽略有意地忽视或置之不问或不理。

sentences.english: Worst of all, people follow them without even asking.
sentences.chinese: 最糟糕的是，人们连问都不问，就这样做。

sentences.english: Whatever the nature of these tempests may be, human irresponsibility is mingled with them.
sentences.chinese: 不问这些风暴的性质如何，其中人负不了责任。

sentences.english: People with brown skins are next door to invisible.
sentences.chinese: 这些棕色人种对邻居也是不闻不问。

sentences.english: The end justifies (or sanctifies) the means.
He campaigned on the promise of repealing “don't ask, don't tell” and DOMA.
sentences.chinese: 他承诺取消”不问，不说“政策和婚姻保护法。

definition: to refuse to acknowledge/to pay no attention to/to take no notice of/to ignore
to get to the heart of the matter
to show an interest in/to get involved with
solely engrossed in one thing/just (one thing, no need to worry about the rest)/simply/by all means/please feel free/do not hesitate (to ask for sth)
not to care
not to hear, not to question (idiom)/to show no interest in sth/uncritical/not in the least concerned
to be indifferent/not to matter/cannot be said to be
to pay no attention to/not to mind
all/without any exceptions/categorically
reason/cause
lips sealed and not saying anything (idiom); fig. to omit mention (of a non-person or embarrassing topic)/to censor
to set to one side and ignore (idiom); quite indifferent/cold and uncaring
to refuse to say anything about (idiom)/to remain tight-lipped/to avoid mentioning
not to mention (idiom); to say not one word/fig. to omit mention (of a non-person or embarrassing topic)/to censor
(reduplicated) whether... or.../never mind/fine (indicating acceptance or resignation)
not divided/irrespective/not distinguishing between
